title: STLLR Gold Releases Annual ESG Report Emphasizing Sustainability
text:
Stay Ahead of the Market:

An update from Moneta Gold ( [(TSE:STLR)](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/tse:stlr) ) is now available.
STLLR Gold has published its annual ESG report, highlighting its commitment to sustainable practices and corporate stewardship while progressing its key assets, the Tower and Colomac Gold Projects in Canada. The company aims to develop safe, sustainable gold mines with community collaboration, ensuring benefits for all stakeholders, and emphasizes its dedication to environmental and social responsibilities.
More about Moneta Gold
STLLR Gold Inc. is a Canadian gold development company focusing on advancing two major gold projects: the Tower Gold Project in Ontario and the Colomac Gold Project in the Northwest Territories. Both projects are poised for long-term, large-scale operations with significant exploration potential. The company is led by an experienced management team dedicated to rapidly advancing these projects.
YTD Price Performance: -4.60%
Average Trading Volume: 184,188
Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Buy
Current Market Cap: C$102.9M
